enabled.description: Enable Basic Authentication Handler, default is true.

enableAD.description: Enable Ldap Authentication, default is true.

allowAnonymous.description:
Do we allow the anonymous to pass the authentication and limit it with some paths
to access? Default is false, and it should only be true in client-proxy.

allowBearerToken.description: Allow bearer token access to the service.

users.description: All user definitions and their path mappings.

paths.description: The different paths that will be valid for this UserAuth
